assets.prompt:
Style: clean flat 2D vector-like illustration, consistent line weight, no gradients, no shadows. Colors: bird fill #cdcdcd, outline/stroke #707070. Background: fill entire canvas with solid chroma key #FF00FF. Do NOT use #FF00FF anywhere in the bird/markings. Output: PNG, square 1024×1024 (or 2048×2048). Framing: do NOT crop, do NOT zoom, do NOT center the subject. Maintain absolute positioning in the full canvas. Negative/avoid: blurry, 3D, realistic, gradients, shadows, ghosting, faint outline of full bird, extra body parts, smoke, partial opacity, cropped, zoomed, centered.
Create the Finch base silhouette/outline for a compositing canvas: body fill color #cdcdcd and outline color #707070. Side profile facing right, perched pose, wings folded. Full body visible. This is the anchor layer. Background must be solid chroma key #FF00FF.
assets.notes: Generate once; use as reference for all canvas layers.

assets.prompt:
Style: clean flat 2D vector-like illustration, consistent line weight, no gradients, no shadows. Colors: bird fill #cdcdcd, outline/stroke #707070. Framing: do NOT crop, do NOT zoom, do NOT center the subject. Maintain absolute positioning in the full canvas. Negative/avoid: blurry, 3D, realistic, gradients, shadows, ghosting, faint outline of full bird, extra body parts, smoke, partial opacity, cropped, zoomed, centered.
Create a simple monochrome UI category icon representing 'Back' (bird field mark category). Minimal, bold outline, centered, readable at small size. Background must be solid chroma key #FF00FF.
assets.notes: Used by ChooseFieldMark.imageView (bird_<area.lowercased>).

Negative/avoid: blurry, 3D, realistic, gradients, shadows, ghosting, faint outline of full bird, extra body parts, smoke, partial opacity, cropped, zoomed, centered.
Create a small UI variation icon for Back = Solid. Simple, bold, centered, readable at 60×60. Flat colors only. Background must be solid chroma key #FF00FF.
assets.notes: Centered is OK; shown in variationsCollectionView.

assets.prompt:
Style: clean flat 2D vector-like illustration, consistent line weight, no gradients, no shadows. Colors: bird fill #cdcdcd, outline/stroke #707070. Background: fill entire canvas with solid chroma key #FF00FF. Do NOT use #FF00FF anywhere in the bird/markings. Output: PNG, square 1024×1024 (or 2048×2048). Framing: do NOT crop, do NOT zoom, do NOT center the subject. Maintain absolute positioning in the full canvas. Negative/avoid: blurry, 3D, realistic, gradients, shadows, ghosting, faint outline of full bird, extra body parts, smoke, partial opacity, cropped, zoomed, centered.
REFERENCE IMAGE PROVIDED: Use the attached finch base as the fixed coordinate frame.
Task: generate a canvas layer ONLY for Back = Solid.
Placement: keep the changed pixels positioned exactly where they belong on the reference bird. Do not move them, do not center them, do not zoom.
Background handling: every pixel NOT part of the intended Back layer must remain solid chroma key #FF00FF (no partial transparency). Do not draw faint outlines/ghosting of the rest of the bird.
Wings rule: this is Back (upper torso) ONLY. Do NOT draw or modify Wings/feather groups; do NOT place patterns on the wing feathers. Keep all wing areas exactly as the base fill (#cdcdcd) or the chroma key background (#FF00FF) if outside the bird silhouette.
assets.notes: Must align to base; use inpainting/reference image.

assets.prompt:
Style: clean flat 2D vector-like illustration, consistent line weight, no gradients, no shadows. Colors: bird fill #cdcdcd, outline/stroke #707070. Background: fill entire canvas with solid chroma key #FF00FF. Do NOT use #FF00FF anywhere in the bird/markings. Output: PNG, square 1024×1024 (or 2048×2048). Framing: do NOT crop, do NOT zoom, do NOT center the subject. Maintain absolute positioning in the full canvas. Negative/avoid: blurry, 3D, realistic, gradients, shadows, ghosting, faint outline of full bird, extra body parts, smoke, partial opacity, cropped, zoomed, centered.
REFERENCE IMAGE PROVIDED: Use the attached finch base as the fixed coordinate frame.
Task: generate a canvas layer ONLY for Beak = Casque.
Placement: keep the changed pixels positioned exactly where they belong on the reference bird. Do not move them, do not center them, do not zoom.
Background handling: every pixel NOT part of the intended Beak layer must remain solid chroma key #FF00FF (no partial transparency). Do not draw faint outlines/ghosting of the rest of the bird.
assets.notes: Must align to base; use inpainting/reference image.
